dimension: 22 3/4 x 59 in. (57.8 x 149.9 cm) (from sleeve end to end)
title: Man's ceremonial shirt (camisa)
description: Shirt made of brown cotton, said to be ixcaco, with narrow natural white stripes; narrow bands of silk supplementary weft patterning at ends of sleeves and at hem in pink, magenta, yellow, green and white.
